update his_medical_order_detail
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_skin_test = #{isSkinTest,jdbcType=INTEGER},
specification = #{specification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

stop_prfing_nurse_id = #{stopPrfingNurseId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

infusion_number = #{infusionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update his_medical_order_detail set number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_skin_test = #{isSkinTest,jdbcType=INTEGER}, specification = #{specification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usages = #{usages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dosage = #{dosage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intervals = #{intervals,jdbcType=INTEGER}, proofreading_nurse_id = #{proofreadingNurseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, approved_nurse_id = #{approvedNurseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, stop_date = #{stopDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stop_user_id = #{stopUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, stop_prfing_nurse_id = #{stopPrfingNurseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, stop_apd_nurse_id = #{stopApdNurseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_stop = #{isStop,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_proofreading = #{isProofreading,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_approved = #{isApproved,jdbcType=INTEGER}, medical_order_type = #{medicalOrderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, target_id = #{targetId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_first_edit = #{isFirstEdit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_stop_proofreading = #{isStopProofreading,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isstopapproved = #{isstopapproved,jdbcType=INTEGER}, correspond_id = #{correspondId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_infusion_list = #{isInfusionList,jdbcType=INTEGER}, infusion_number = #{infusionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.*, b.user_name as pnName, c.user_name as anName, d.user_name as sanName, e.user_name as spnName,f.user_name as stopUserName FROM his_medical_order_detail as a left join `his-userinfo`.user_info as b on a.proofreading_nurse_id = b.id left join `his-userinfo`.user_info as c on a.approved_nurse_id = c.id left join `his-userinfo`.user_info as d on a.stop_prfing_nurse_id = d.id left join `his-userinfo`.user_info as e on a.stop_apd_nurse_id = e.id left join `his-userinfo`.user_info as f on a.stop_user_id = f.id where a.number = #{parameter.number,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
order by ${parameter.orders}
select his_medical_order_detail.* from his_medical_order_detail where number = #{parameter.number,jdbcType = VARCHAR} order by order_num desc

SELECT a.*, b.user_name as pnName, c.user_name as anName, d.user_name as sanName, e.user_name as spnName,f.user_name as stopUserName FROM his_medical_order_detail as a left join `his-userinfo`.user_info as b on a.proofreading_nurse_id = b.id left join `his-userinfo`.user_info as c on a.approved_nurse_id = c.id left join `his-userinfo`.user_info as d on a.stop_prfing_nurse_id = d.id left join `his-userinfo`.user_info as e on a.stop_apd_nurse_id = e.id left join `his-userinfo`.user_info as f on a.stop_user_id = f.id where a.number = #{parameter.number,jdbcType = VARCHAR} and a.is_stop = 2 order by order_num asc
mapper.insert:

(#{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isSkinTest,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.specification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.usages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dosage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.intervals,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.proofreadingNurseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.approvedNurseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.stopDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.stopUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.stopPrfingNurseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.stopApdNurseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.totalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.isStop,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.isProofreading,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.isApproved,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,#{item.medicalOrderType,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.targetId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.isFirstEdit,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.isStopProofreading,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,#{item.isstopapproved,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.correspondId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.isInfusionList,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.infusionNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select his_medical_order_detail.infusion_number from his_medical_order_detail where is_infusion_list = 1 and is_stop = 2 GROUP BY infusion_number
